name: Armored Brigade
notes:
Please install the game to the default install directory.
Once installed use Lutris' "Run EXE inside wine prefix" feature to run the most recent patch and DLC installer.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Matrix Games/Armored Brigade/autorun.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
